Keys Luminos Day & Night Moisturizer

Brand: Keys

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Purified water, avocado fruit oil, shea butter, carrot seed oil, black seed oil, agave gel, blood orange essential oil, clary sage essential oil, vegetable glycerin USP.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restri
MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
